title: Update CONTRIBUTING.md
description:
CONTRIBUTING.md is missing several sections:

- How to build and run the tests. The example applications have to be built before the tests can be run. Otherwise the tests will fail with a cryptic message because the example applications are missing. Migrate any content from examples/README into CONTRIBUTING.md and delete examples/README.
- How to view the manual pages.
- Various linters and how to run them (clippy, cargo fmt, markdownlint). See .github/workflows/build.yml for how the CI build runs these.
